weRecycleToSavePlanet: We recycle to save the planet
description: Connects companies that need to dispose of recyclable waste with recycling enterprises.
footerText: We help businesses and individuals reduce waste volume by turning recyclable materials into new resources.
aboutUsText: This is an environmental project aimed at creating an efficient system for waste collection, sorting, and recycling. We help businesses and individuals reduce waste volume and transform recyclable materials into new resources.
aboutUs1: We organize convenient collection of recyclables.
aboutUs2: We implement eco-friendly solutions for businesses and residential complexes.
aboutUs3: We increase recycling awareness through educational programs.
aboutUs4: We collaborate with recycling enterprises for effective waste utilization.
ourMission: Our goal is a world without unnecessary waste!
downloadPresentationGetFamiliar: Download the presentation and learn about our company’s activities
fromWasteToNewProductsText1: In the first six months of 2024, 270 thousand tonnes out of 5.2 million tonnes of waste were recycled, accounting for 5.2% of the total volume
fromWasteToNewProductsText2: These figures indicate a serious problem with plastic waste disposal
fromWasteToNewProductsText3:
Uzbekistan generates approximately 27.9 thousand tonnes of solid household waste daily, of which around 2.87 thousand tonnes is plastic.

Out of this volume, no more than 5.2% is recycled, averaging about 150 tonnes of plastic per day. The remaining (over 2.7 thousand tonnes) ends up in landfills or is incinerated
whatWasteRecycledInto: What are plastic wastes recycled into?
contactWithUsSub: Leave a request, and our managers will get in touch with you.
chooseUs: Choose Wasteless to develop Uzbekistan’s circular economy!
chooseUsSub: Our primary goal is to maximize the recycling rate by creating an IT platform for efficient collection and recycling of recyclable waste.
howWeWork2: Send a request via the app
howWeWork3: A courier arrives at the scheduled time
howWeWork4: The courier picks up the waste for recycling and closes the request
howWeWork5: Find a plastic recycling drop-off point through the app
howWeWork6: Bring your waste to the drop-off point for recycling
howWeWork7: You earn extra income, and the waste getsa new life!
